scripts.update: npm run updateModules && rm -rf cache/* && npm run start
scripts.build: yarn start && yarn timeseries && yarn buildSite
scripts.deploy: npm run dateData && npm run deploySite
scripts.dateData: DATE=$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') && cp dist/data.json dist/data-$DATE.json && cp dist/features.json dist/features-$DATE.json && cp dist/data.csv dist/data-$DATE.csv
